text: Let's work together to eliminate cervical cancer! 🎉🌻 Get informed about prevention methods and screening guidelines from the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists. 💡👉 Ages 21-29: Pap test every 3 years. Take advantage of free breast and cervical cancer screenings in Massachusetts! 🎁🏥 If diagnosed, consult an oncologist promptly for treatment options. 🙏🏼
